 WinRect ()

Detailed Description

Obsolete - Describes a rectangle, which is stored in absolute and relative coordinates.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WinRect::WinRect (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

XYDIM  abs_left = 0,
XYDIM  abs_top = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
rect Bounding rectangle given in relative coordinates.
abs_left Left position of the rectangle given in absolute coordinates.
abs_top Top position of the rectangle given in absolute coordinates.
